column2: select R.TRANSACTION_ID,convert(char(19),R.TRANSACTION_DTM,23) as TRANSACTION_DTM,R.MOBILE_NO,R.RECHARGE_AMT,R.RECHARGE_CHANNEL,R.RECEIPT_STATUS,R.RECEIPT_NO,convert(char(10),R.RECEIPT_DATE,23) as RECEIPT_DATE, R.SPECIFICATION_ID, R.BILLING_SYSTEM from PMDB..PM_RECHARGE R inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_LOAD_BATCH B on (R.BATCH_ID = B.BATCH_ID) where B.ORDER_ID = @order_id
